tabs.tab_title: Where and when does the event take place?
tabs.tab_content: The Green Quarter takes place on Sunday 18th May in The Entertainment Quarter, 122 Lang Rd, Moore Park, NSW 2021.
Everyoneâ€™s welcome. The festival is a family fun day celebrating Irish culture and heritage but you donâ€™t have to be Irish to attend or enjoy the festival.

tabs.tab_title: How do I get to the events?
tabs.tab_content: Unless stated explicitly in the event information, the Secretariat do not cover transport costs to and from events. It is your responsibility to arrange transport to and from the event. However, the Secretariat will provide specific information, if necessary, to those attending.
This is a free community funded event; there will be buckets at the park entrance for you to have the opportunity to make a gold coin donation.

tabs.tab_title: How do I get a ticket?
tabs.tab_content: To allocate tickets and manage our events we use Eventbrite. To reserve a ticket for an event, you must first register with Eventbrite. When you sign up please make sure that you use the same name and email address that we have on file for you. After you have registered with Eventbrite you will be able to save an event for future reference.

tabs.tab_title: Can I know who else is going?
tabs.tab_content: We do not provide details of other attendees to scholars. Please use the Facebook group to enquire about others going and to arrange transport or accommodation.
